org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest

Class Driver.ProcessReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest.Driver.ProcessReader
  • Enclosing class:
    Driver

    public static class Driver.ProcessReader
extends Object
    Utility class to read output from a process. This class is stateless, this is the only case where it's safe to start a Thread from inside the constructor.
